text: Ah, you made it! I have been looking forward to seeing you again.
I have something important to discuss with you.
I knew I was right to come to you.

As you know, I have been attempting to figuratively 
renovate myself to fit with our modern age.

Yet recently, I feel that I am not getting anywhere. 
Is it truly too late to change...?

I see... my age is nothing to be ashamed of. I may never be 
young again, yet there is nothing stopping me from continuing 
to learn and grow.

The time we've spent together has been 
lovely - I couldn't imagine a better friend to share 
my journey with. But, regardless, the date has just begun!

Hmm... that's an interesting perspective. Perhaps my difficulties 
with change are a result of fear, rather than age...

This revelation could not have come to pass 
were it not for your counsel. Sincerely, I thank you.
I... need to go. Conversing with you was a mistake, no cap.
